description: A powerful, multi-function Telegram bot with AI capabilities, media downloading, user management, and much more. Built for communities and power users.

about.title: About Kowalski
about.subtitle: Kowalski is an open-source, feature-rich Telegram bot built with modern web technologies. From AI-powered conversations to video downloads, user management, and community features — it's designed to enhance your Telegram experience while respecting your privacy.
about.architectureDescription: We've built Kowalski with modern technologies and best practices for reliability and maintainability.
about.theStackDescription: Kowalski is built completely in TypeScript with Node.js and Telegraf. The web interface uses Next.js with Tailwind CSS, while data persistence is handled by PostgreSQL with Drizzle ORM.
about.typescriptNodeDescription: A solid, type-safe backend w/ Telegraf
about.nextjsDescription: Modern, responsive admin and user panel
about.deploymentDescription: Kowalski is built to be deployed anywhere, and has been tested on multiple platforms. We prioritize support for Docker and Bun for easy deployment.
about.dockerDescription: Easy containerized deployment w/ Docker Compose
about.bunDescription: A fast JavaScript runtime for best performance
about.modularDescription: We make it easy to extend and modify Kowalski
about.aiIntegrationsDescription: Kowalski has support for 50+ AI models, with customizable options for users and admins through its Ollama backend.
about.vastModelSupportDescription: Kowalski has built-in support for 50+ models, both thinking and non-thinking. We have good Markdown parsing and customizable options for both users and admins.
about.askDescription: Fast answers using smaller non-thinking models
about.thinkDescription: Advanced thinking models with togglable reasoning visibility
about.aiCustomDescription: Users can configure and use their favorite model
about.kowalskiPowerfulDescription: We have amazing Markdown V2 parsing, queue management, and usage statistics tracking. It's hella private, too. AI is disabled by default for a good user and admin experience.
about.streamingDescription: Real-time streaming and parsing of messages during generation
about.usageStatsDescription: Track your AI requests and usage with /aistats
about.queuesDescription: High usage limits with intelligent request queuing
about.userFirstDescription: Kowalski has privacy-focused user management with customizable settings, multilingual support, and transparent data handling.
about.privacyDescription: User data is minimized and linked only by Telegram ID. No personal information is shared with third parties, and users maintain full control over their data with easy account deletion options.
about.limitedDataDescription: Only essential data is stored, linked by Telegram ID
about.easyDeletionDescription: You can delete your data at any time
about.customizationDescription: Personalize your experience with our extensive suite of custom AI preferences and detailed usage statistics.
about.aiPreferencesDescription: Choose from 50+ models, with the chance to configure your system prompt and temperature
about.moreFeaturesDescription: Kowalski has a ton of entertainment, utility, fun, configuration, and information commands.
about.mediaDownloadsDescription: Download videos from YouTube and 1000s of other platforms using yt-dlp. Featuring automatic size checking for Telegram.
about.informationUtilitiesDescription: Access real-world information like weather reports, device specifications, HTTP status codes, and a Last.fm music integration.
about.entertainmentDescription: Interactive emojis, random animal pictures, My Little Pony, and fun commands to engage you and your community.
about.communityDescription: Kowalski is built by developers, for developers. We use open licenses and take input from our development communities.
about.openDevelopmentDescription: Kowalski is licensed under BSD-3-Clause with components under Unlicense. Our codebase is available on our GitHub, with lots of documentation.
about.publicCodeDescription: Feel free to contribute or review our code
about.documentationDescription: We have documentation to help contributors, users, and admins
about.contributorFriendlyDescription: Our communities are welcoming to new contributors
about.communityCentricDescription: Kowalski was created by Lucas Gabriel (lucmsilva). It is now also maintained by ihatenodejs, givfnz2, and other contributors. Thank you to all of our contributors!
about.activeMaintenanceDescription: Regular updates and fixes w/ room for input and feedback
about.qualityCodeDescription: We use TypeScript, linting, and modern standards
about.newFeaturesDescription: We are always looking for new features to add

home.featuresSubtitle: Powered by TypeScript, Telegraf, Next.js, and AI.
home.aiCommandsDescription: Interact with over 50 AI models through simple commands. Get intelligent responses, assistance, or problem-solving help right in Telegram.
home.youtubeDescription: Download videos directly from YouTube and other platforms and watch them in Telegram. Supports thousands of sites with integrated yt-dlp.
home.controlDescription: Your user data is always minimized and under your control. That certainly doesn't mean the experience is lacking!
home.userAccountsDescription: Your user data is linked only by your Telegram ID. No data is ever sent to third parties or used for anything other than providing you with the best experience.
home.webInterfaceDescription: Kowalski includes a web interface, made with Next.js, to make it easier to manage your bot, user account, and more. It's tailored to both users and admins.
home.aiCustomDescription: Ask questions to a custom AI model of your choice
home.askDescription: Quick AI responses for everyday questions
home.thinkDescription: Deep reasoning with optional visible thinking
home.ratelimitDescription: We'll notify you if something goes wrong
home.qualityDescription: Kowalski automatically chooses the best quality for you
home.personalSettingsDescription: Custom AI models, temperature, and language preferences
home.accountStatisticsDescription: Track AI requests, characters processed, and more
home.leaveAnytimeDescription: We make it easy to delete your account at any time
home.cleanInterfaceDescription: We don't clutter your view with ads or distractions.
home.doEverythingDescription: We aim to integrate every feature into the web interface.
home.privateDescription: We don't use any analytics, tracking, or third-party scripts.

login.title: Login to Kowalski
login.usernameSubtitle: Please enter your Telegram username to continue.
login.twoFaSubtitle: We've sent a 6-digit code to your Telegram. Please enter it below.

account.title: Account Settings
account.systemPromptDescription: Instructions that guide the AI's behavior and responses
account.temperatureDescription: Controls randomness in AI responses. Lower values (0.1-0.5) = more focused, higher values (0.7-2.0) = more creative.
account.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
account.deleteAccountConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.
account.accountDeleted: Your account has been deleted. You will now be redirected to the home page. Thanks for using Kowalski!
account.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again.
account.bugReportNote: Found a bug? Let us know! Report issues on our GitHub.
account.featureRequestNote: Have an idea for a new feature? We'd love to hear it! Submit feature requests on GitHub.
account.showThinkingDescription: Display the AI's reasoning process when available
account.systemPromptOverride: Override the default system prompt used for AI queries. You can use placeholders (see the sidebar) to customize the prompt with live information.
account.differentModelsDescription: Your selected AI model for custom /ai commands. Different models have varying capabilities, speeds, and response styles.
account.choosePreferredLanguage: Choose your preferred language for bot responses and interface text.
account.reportBugDescription: Found a bug or issue? Report it to help us improve Kowalski.
account.featureRequestDescription: Have an idea for a new feature? Let us know what you'd like to see!

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.subtitle: Permanently remove your account and data
deleteAccount.deletingWillRemove: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data, including:
deleteAccount.aiUsageStats: AI usage statistics and request history
deleteAccount.allSessions: All associated sessions and authentication data
deleteAccount.name: Name
deleteAccount.thisWillImmediately: This will immediately and permanently delete your account.
deleteAccount.areYouSure: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.yourAccountWillBeRemoved: Your account @{{username}} and all associated data will be permanently removed.
deleteAccount.successMessage: Your account has been deleted. You will now be redirected to the home page. Thanks for using Kowalski!
deleteAccount.errorOccurred: An error occurred while deleting your account. Please try again.

footer.andContributors: and contributors under the BSD-3-Clause and Unlicense.
